website_summaries.verdict: Once this multi-level treehouse is built, kids will love sending Mia and Daniel to read spooky stories, munch pizza, and ride the zip line over and over.
pros: Assemble a tall treehouse with a zip line, attic, and secret tree trunk compartment
cons: Be sure to keep track of its many tiny accessories

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: My house is filling up with Legos. My daughter loves this set! If this review was helpful, please click 'Helpful' at the bottom of the review. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: mick04u

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Lego set to date!  Great quality as usual!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my grandkids favorite lego set. The play with it endlessly! It is somewhat interactive with the zipline from the tree to the ground. Buy it for your kids/grandkids; you will not regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen B.

customer_reviews.title: layers don't fit well
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was excited to put this together. There are a lot of pieces but we were doing it together nicely until the 2nd layer. It does not attach which makes it really challenging to continue putting the pieces together. Very frustrating for me as an adult. My daughter gave up and now it sits here collecting dust. Really a shame it isn't properly made. It would be a cool toy for her to play with.
customer_reviews.author: SE

customer_reviews.title: Gift for niece - nice gift but hard for her to put together with so many little pieces
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 7 year old. Love the legos and the idea of the tree house. However, she could not put this together by herself. She plays with all the piece BUT but you must have patience to put it together. The price was better than that of WalMart
customer_reviews.author: slsrb

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play, as always :)
customer_reviews.text: LEGO is always a fun thing to do with the little one during weekend at home :)
customer_reviews.author: Begal House

customer_reviews.title: Legos are for girls too!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a 9 y/o girl future builder. It was a hit... Legos are for girls too!! A treehouse ... what’s not to love!! Lots of pieces for hours of play..
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Who

customer_reviews.title: This turned out very cool but was much more difficult than other sets my ...
customer_reviews.text: This turned out very cool but was much more difficult than other sets my daughter has had. We had to help a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa P

customer_reviews.title: Always a safe bet as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to niece for 10th birthday. She LOVED IT! LEGOS are always a safe bet and she had requested some from this line. I really like that they have started to market sets to girls—always good to encourage interest in STEM building skills as early as possible and give them the interest and confidence to explore these areas throughout their education. Set was complete, age appropriate, well made, colorful and came with good instructions. The only criticism that I have is I wish that the boxes were better suited to long-term reuse and storage (and that errant LEGOS weren’t so PAINFUL when stepped on! 😂)
customer_reviews.author: Jake W

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: Set was mis-labeled in the descriptions, while my 4-year old granddaughter loved it there were sooo many pieces that we didn't feel comfortable with her playing with it. However, the box did say it was for an older child but again, the set was in the 4-7 category on Amazon. I'm more careful now to thoroughly read the descriptions.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Better for over 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: Took it for my 4.5 year old. This set was fun to build, with beautiful directions! However, my daughter definitely needed help with this one.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Cute Lego set yet ....
customer_reviews.text: This kit is ages 6 up, yet it took considerable time to put together creating frustration and a loss of interest of a six year old that is able to assemble Lego sets. I was disappointed that it took me some time to figure out that not all the pieces are in the dedicated bags - but show up in another bag hence compromising the overall build of the tree house. None the less I will be more deliberate in selecting kits. While this was cute - it did not provided the building experience I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy K.

customer_reviews.title: Good birthday present.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old granddarling requested this and loved it when she got it. Like any LEGO-type toy, the rating will depend on the child’s ability to keeping small toy parts organized. She really enjoyed this one and would have been able to put it together by herself if her 8 year old sister hadn’t “helped” (The 8 year old really liked it too). Personally I don’t like stepping on straying LEGO bricks but this set is particularly cute.
customer_reviews.author: lhb

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's favorite set!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 6, and we are big Lego fans. She loves this one-- it's challenging, but she can do it by herself. However, she loves to play with it! After it's assembled it will sit out for days on my kitchen table so she can play. Big thumbs up from us! I've gifted it to my niece and she loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: emily121212

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but work.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was SO EXCITED to get this. My hands are so angry at me for helping her set it up. So many tiny details to add. Flowers everywhere. Little stickers of love notes, and maps, and secret treasures. All things that girls love. In tiny hand wrecking pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Van Arsdale

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Fun Gift
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter would love this gift, it's what she asked for this Christmas. I celebrate with my three adult children and grandchildren after the Christmas rush. Had to return it because my daughter who is her aunt got it for her. Great minds think alike! A granddaughter who talks to me about art deserves a good present so I got her the Lego Emma's Art Stand instead, she will love it.
customer_reviews.author: crouton56

customer_reviews.title: 351 pieces, most of them tiny
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed that bricks are tiny and break with little use. What has happened to Lego quality? I wish they would spend more resources on making the main structure larger and more stable than coming up with so many tiny novelties. For instance, a larger base plate would make it more fun to play with than all the little tidbits (newspaper, bunny hopspot, etc). My daughter owns several Friends sets, yet not enough blocks to build a small house!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Child was very pleased and put it together the same day
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a birthday gift. Child was very pleased and put it together the same day. Items are packaged separately and instructions are color coded so assembly was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Parents and kids built this together and had hours of fun playing with it afterwards. I personally did not like how the roof was just sitting on top of the treasure chest and you had to open the roof to access it... I would have preferred a real attic with no removable roof.
customer_reviews.author: ScotFlowerTop Contributor: Children's Books

customer_reviews.title: Nifty LEGO set great for 6 and up
customer_reviews.text: Totally happy with set my grandkids loved it and played for hours and then a couple days later when they came back they played with it again. This makes the 5th set of LEGOs I have purchased and my grandkids never seem to get tired or bored with them - and the zip line really worked and they were thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Mynning

customer_reviews.title: Best gift
customer_reviews.text: Cute set that was throughly enjoyed by myself and my 6 year old daughter. We loved how cute and quirky the set was and she loved how the friends line introduced a new boy figure. Was relatively simple to assemble and was fun to do as well. Gives excellent vibes.
customer_reviews.author: Amy gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Legos are not cheap.. think about that.
customer_reviews.text: Decent value. Please be aware that legos take time, effort and in this case... instructions. It took me a loooonnngg while to put this together with my 4y old. If you have patience, time and the money then you or your child will love this tree house.
customer_reviews.author: ViceP

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, but the figures are not as high quality as I expect from Lego
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good toy, but the figures in the set are not good quality. The lego bricks are great, but after a few weeks of use, the figures heads are always coming off, and the hands are broken. The regular Lego mini-figs do not have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: dgal1234

customer_reviews.title: Cute LEGO set!
customer_reviews.text: My 6-year old daughter loves the LEGO and Friends sets and she was so excited to get the treehouse! I love all the little things it comes with like the flashlight, pizza, scary stories book, bird nest, and the zip line! The price is very reasonable for all the things you get with it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Lego set!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for Christmas for my daughter. Her brother is obsessed with legos and she always feels left out. This is a cute little set for girls that also has instructions on how to put it together as well. Of course the pieces are small, just like normal legos, but once put together it is really cute!! She us 7. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Jibs

customer_reviews.title: Cute. A little hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very cute set bought for my 6 almost 7 year old daughter. She has put together many lego sets before trucks and things this was the first friends set we have bought. The tree was a bit tricky many parts only attached by one piece too much pressure above caused it to come apart. But with help she got it and its very fub to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cute, zip line does not work well
customer_reviews.text: Great vaue, cheaper than in stores. Make sure all pieces are locked together good, it can make for an unfortunate event if it comes apart while playing. Thw zip line is very short and it often ends up undoing the bottom strucuture. It would be better if it came with a longer platform to attach the bottom of the zip line to the tree house. We ended up ising pur own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I feel like Legos are overpriced in general, but all of my kids love them. Of all of the toys I’ve purchased, these get used the most and the longest. I was hoping the treehouse would be a little bigger, but my daughter likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara A. Strand

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love about LEGOs? I purchased this for my daughter as a gift; it arrived timely and it pristine condition. One of the first gifts my daughter opened and instantly began playing with. Perfect for a 6+ year old and provides hours or more of fun. I really like the vibrant colors.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a friend's daughter. She's 9 and really wanted LEGO sets for her birthday. She's a little bit Tomboy and a little bit Girly Girl so this was the perfect find for her. She was so excited when she opened it!
customer_reviews.author: BeastModeMama

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love the Friends Lego sets. This one has been just as great as the others we have purchased and they were thrilled. It is a little harder to assemble compared to other sets but still doable.
customer_reviews.author: l.page

customer_reviews.title: Build things...Build a CHILD!
customer_reviews.text: Our precocious 5 yr old loved it! We laid out all the pieces per category; read directions together; she selected correct piece; put it together; and , we could see the pride of accomplishment all over her face. Really helps exercise linear, processional thinking...and, it was just pure FUN!
customer_reviews.author: R2RO&MzB

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This set is a great add-on to the Friends world. My 7 year old built it by the directions but it has evolved into other things over the past couple weeks... I believe it's now an animal rescue/farm/animal clinic. LEGO rocks and this set delivers a lot of creative options. :)
customer_reviews.author: CCE

customer_reviews.title: Fun Lego set!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Lego set! My daughter (8) was able to put it together in a bit over an hour with help here or other but mostly on her own! It’s very cute and she loves that the little Lego people have somewhere to play in the tree house! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kate B

customer_reviews.title: Super cute Lego set
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my niece for Christmas. She was so excited to put it together that she couldn't wait til she got home to do it. She had it all out together before leaving my in-laws house.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Lego never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: It was tough for a 4yr old but with the hep of her 7yr old brother, the two kids were able to assemble the whole thing almost on their own. Kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: YokT

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if we did something wrong but no matter how we looked at it the net part didn’t fit as the directions stated. We just did it a little different and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Linn

customer_reviews.title: 8 yr old loved it
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old bought this for herself with money she earned. She loved it! She had it assembled in just a couple of hours, so maybe it was a bit too easy, but she plays with it now that it's assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Jen24

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for all!
customer_reviews.text: We love Legos and this set was great for my 7 year old. She did need help with some parts but it was fun to work together as well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R.

customer_reviews.title: it was a little hard but I got it
customer_reviews.text: I got this set and it was a little hard and the pieces sometimes stay together so i asked my brother because he has been building legos for a while and he fixed it. But other than that is was fun to build and I enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly C.

customer_reviews.title: My 5.5 year old loved this!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so excited to work on this set. She spent about 3-4 hours total building this and now loves playing with the set with her twin brother. She skipped screen time and worked on it first thing in the morning 2 days in a row she was so excited.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun set for kids.
customer_reviews.text: My daughters play with this constantly. They are 4 and 6 and needed help assembling it but they love the zip line and treasure chest and it was nice to get a set with a boy LEGO character since they have mostly girls.
customer_reviews.author: HoneyBEE

customer_reviews.title: 9 year old fun
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old was very happy with this gift from Santa. And my 16 year old told me I bought the same thing for her years ago. So I guess it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: anna merlo

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Helped my 9 year old put together. Instruction book is very easy to follow. A little time consuming depending on how many pieces are in the box.
customer_reviews.author: mjamzn

customer_reviews.title: Legos. perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Never found a kid who didn't play with legos. My grandaughters play with them as much or more than my grandsons.
customer_reviews.author: Dory

customer_reviews.title: Fun addition to daughter's LEGO collection
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up for my daughter and she was excited to include it in her LEGO Friends collection. It exactly what you expect with LEGO - quality, bright colors, and lots of fun to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: PattyH04

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! Why are legos so expensive. She loved it and put it together in 2 days or so. Still loves and and it easy to reassemble other ways as well. She likes to tear it apart and show us how to reassemble it the right way.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: great for kids staying at home
customer_reviews.text: my daughter is excited and spending all her day on these things. much much better than staying before TV and iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Happy kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets for my grand daughters and one for my great granddaughter. They loved them. Instructions were great for my 7 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Conni

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: So happy I got this LEGO set for my daughter for Christmas she is a lego freak ! Didn’t take long to put it together. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great Girl's Gift!!
customer_reviews.text: The Girls were super excited and it was very easy to follow the instructions to assemble!! I would buying it again for future gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Melvin

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: As with all of the Lego kits - this was really adorable and my granddaughter put it together easily.
customer_reviews.author: N. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Kids will love it.
customer_reviews.text: What can I tell you? My daughter assembled it on the spot and started playing with it. I can’t ask for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: cesar de la guardia

customer_reviews.title: Lego fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and age appropriate for my granddaughter. She loved it! I have bought several other sets from this series for her since she enjoyed this one so much!
customer_reviews.author: Sc71

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to build
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this for Christmas and loves it. She is eight and was able to build it by herself. The pieces stay snapped together while she is playing with it, unlike some of the other lego sets that she has had.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a birthday gift for 6 yr old granddaughter; I was concerned about all the small parts and it did require some help from parents to assemble but apparently she loves it and plays with it constantly.
customer_reviews.author: ModGrandma

customer_reviews.title: granddaugher loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several set for my 9 year old granddaughter and she completed a lot of them on Christmas day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome LEGO Tree House
customer_reviews.text: The zip line feature is super cool! Assemble takes a bit, but it is easy. Has lots of details. Has very cute extras for the LEGO people. Just wish it had two shooter guns instead of just one.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Zink

customer_reviews.title: More for children 8 and up
customer_reviews.text: Thought this for a friend's daughter. She's 6 and its too intricate for her. So her nine-year-old sister is putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Helene Ferraro

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves the detail of this kit. Had a few frustrations putting it together but a little challenge is ok. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi G

customer_reviews.title: Too many tiny pieces
customer_reviews.text: The minute I got this for my 4 year old granddaughter, I tossed it. Tiny pieces and so many of them. My bad.
customer_reviews.author: mls5555

customer_reviews.title: Best Lego friends we have bought!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has quite a few of the Lego friends, and this was by far her favorite. So many accessories. They thought of everything! So fun to put together and my 7 yr old needed minimal help...
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dudley

customer_reviews.title: The fact that girls also like Lego and the it was.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy this item for myself needless to say, but my eight year old granddaughter loved it and was very proud to inform me that she put everything together herself!
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Miskewitch

customer_reviews.title: Very clever product
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved it. Very creatively crafted. She is eight years old and it has given her hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Blayney

customer_reviews.title: Happy Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Got for granddaughter 11th birthday. She loved it. She loves legos. What a great time for it. The other one took over a week to come so we were pleased to recieve this one the very next day.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: It was fun
customer_reviews.text: Very cute my daughter and I had fun putting it together she’s 7 and she definitely needed help.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Falconer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Lego Set for Kids Who Love Animals
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved getting this set for Christmas. The little accent pieces and animals are adorable. It took about an 75 minutes to assemble. The instructions are pretty clear and cover assembly step by step.
customer_reviews.author: Roy A.

customer_reviews.title: Shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: A local difficult for a kid to do but if a parent wants to put it together it's a really cool little treehouse wish it came with more tree pieces
customer_reviews.author: Cristy Y.

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun set!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter's birthday and it arrived within a couple of days. She loves it!! It is fun Lego set and was on sale so that was a bonus as well. I will definitely be purchasing more of the Friends Lego sets.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this set. She is 8 and was able to put it together by herself
customer_reviews.author: WattsBuzzin

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: I gave only 1 star because of the missing items. For example the zip line is missing!
customer_reviews.author: Edwardo Carandang

customer_reviews.title: Layers don’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Layers do not fit. Very frustrating. My daughter, who is normally able to do any of the LEGO Friends sets on her own, needed a lot of assistance. I felt just as frustrated as she did. The plates do not stay connected as you continue to build. We usually love all of our LEGO sets. This one was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: lisa farris

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: No difference from store product. My niece (age 6) put it together in an afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T

customer_reviews.title: Mia's Treehouse for Mia
customer_reviews.text: My great niece asked for this for Christmas-- probably because her name is Mia. Smart marketing, Lego! She played with it right out of the box. I'd say it was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Rubeck

customer_reviews.title: 6 yr old needed a lot of help.....was excited
customer_reviews.text: Grandpa helped his 6 yr old granddaughter put the tree house together. Lots of little pieces. He followed the great instruction booklet, and she loved it! (She would not have been able to put it together by herself.) She loved playing with it when it was put together!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Friends collection
customer_reviews.text: Nice gift for your legomaniac ! GREAT addition to the friends collection
customer_reviews.author: Va.Geo

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a gift for my young niece in India. The package travels well and was perfect for a curious kid in the listed age range.
customer_reviews.author: TinTin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Set!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and four year old put this together and loved it! The only issue they had was the zip line isn’t really all that great. This is a great set.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves legos. This was a great price. She had so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: René

customer_reviews.title: Box damaged
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine but the box cane damaged. It’s not a huge deal but it is a Christmas present to be left out from Santa. Guess he’ll just have to think things get damaged in the sleigh. I realize it doesn’t affect the actual product and it’s not a big deal. Wouldn’t even care if it weren’t a Santa gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Buss

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and creative lots of tiny details
customer_reviews.text: Soo many tiny pieces for an organized kiddo maybe a bit onset than my kiddo
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to love about LEGOs
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is obsessed with LEGO. She loved this set.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne B.

customer_reviews.title: Love Legos!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love Legos and this tree house is no exception. My daughter loves playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Miajoy

customer_reviews.title: Show stopper
customer_reviews.text: Niece just loves it. Show me it every time I am there.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann Kopek - Minnick

customer_reviews.title: Legos Friend Treehouse
customer_reviews.text: Christmas Gift for 6 year old granddaughter. She loved it. Had no difficulty in assembling!
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute Lego Set
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to 7-year old granddaughter, and she loved it! A little challenging to assemble for a 7-year old, but that makes it good for when older too. It is super cute and fun to play with!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Landis

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was damaged a little. Besides that it was ok...we gifted it to a friend. Cute LEGO idea though
customer_reviews.author: Familyof5

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking set but it was very hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: The set was very hard to put together, a few pieces were missing
customer_reviews.author: Polina Pridanova

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It was fun to assemble and the kids loved it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter loved it and did it all by herself!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter (6yr) loves this series. She can put them together without help, but I have no idea if that is common. Lots of small touches that make me smile.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stevens

customer_reviews.title: This set hooked me on Legos
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I had so much fun building this set. I'd never seen the appeal of Legos until she got this. Now I'm hooked, and she had almost as much fun building it as she does playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Zizek the Crazy Space Wallaby

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described and arrived on time if not a little early
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition. All the pieces were there and my niece loved putting it together. Would order again for a different child.
customer_reviews.author: Kit 21

customer_reviews.title: LEGO gift for 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: Really tiny pieces, but the 7 year old I bought it for really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Creative, Fun Toy
customer_reviews.text: My great nephew, aged 5, loved his new toy, and he has spent lots of time building and rebuilding. Legos are "as good as it gets" for creative, educational toys for children. I will send him more legos in the future. His parents love the fact that he enjoys them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness it wasn’t a gift for my kids.
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have is the packaging...or lack there of. Thankfully this was not a gift for any of my children, but had it been, it was not in an “amazon” box. There are labels stuck to the original box. The box itself is smushed and damaged. Not very nice appearance to give someone as a gift. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my niece and she enjoyed assembling the LEGO set.
customer_reviews.author: trenell13

customer_reviews.title: It's fun, but a little tricky for little girls
customer_reviews.text: My 7-year-old daughter loves it. It's just a little hard design for her to assemble together as other legos for her age.
customer_reviews.author: dumplingjw

customer_reviews.title: Lego's
customer_reviews.text: Good deal, Lego's average 10 cents each, if less its a good deal
customer_reviews.author: Teresa D.

customer_reviews.title: Birthday surprise!!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter got this for her 5th birthday and she loves it. It met all of our expectations!!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Conger

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Our five year old grandson loves these kits. Can't lose on this one.
customer_reviews.author: TravelingOn

product_meta.title: LEGO Friends Mia’s Tree House 41335 Creative Building Toy Set for Kids, Best Learning and Roleplay Gift for Girls and Boys (351 Pieces)
product_meta.description: This LEGO Friends 41335 Mia’s Tree House construction toy is packed with features and details to create hours of fun for Mia, her brother, and any friends who might come to visit. There’s a folding ladder, scramble net and a zip wire for access to and from the second floor, plus a water gun, a book of ghost stories, artwork tiles, board game, pizza, sports equipment, Mia’s skateboard and much more inside. Includes 2 mini-dolls plus 2 animal figures. 351 pieces – creative building set for boys and girls between the ages of 6 and 12 years.
feature_bullets: Both girls and boys will love building LEGO Friends Mia's Tree House set where they can experience roleplay fun and creative adventures inside a detailed tree house toy. Includes a zip wire, attic with opening roof, and a climbing net.

This creative treehouse playset includes 351 pieces. Mia’s Tree House features Mia and Daniel mini-doll figures, plus Mimi, the bunny, and Cinnamon, the bird, pet figures. This is the perfect Christmas or birthday gift for kids!

Features a folding ladder, a cool skateboard for the mini-dolls to ride and wild animal figures to inspire creative building play and fun adventures. This is the perfect playset for kids who enjoy roleplay.
Youngsters will enjoy the creative and unique building experience that this playset offers. It is compatible with all other LEGO building bricks and sets for endless fun!

Tree house playset measures over 6” (16cm) high, 6” (17cm) wide and 6” (16cm) deep; Bunny house measures over 1” (3cm) high, 1” (4cm) wide and 1” (3cm) deep. 351 pieces – Creative building set for boys and girls ages 6-12.
